title: The Future App
character_description: A young adult in their mid-20s, with a modern and approachable appearance.
user_prompt: A young entrepreneur discovers a mysterious app that predicts the future, leading to a series of dramatic events that test their moral choices

shots.prompt: Close-up portrait of A young adult in their mid-20s, with a modern and approachable appearance., looking directly at camera with confident expression, professional lighting, cinematic quality
shots.negative: blurry, low quality, distorted, multiple people

shots.prompt: Medium shot of A young adult in their mid-20s, with a modern and approachable appearance. in modern office setting, natural lighting, professional attire, thoughtful expression
Wide shot of A young adult in their mid-20s, with a modern and approachable appearance. walking confidently through urban environment, golden hour lighting, cinematic composition
Close-up of A young adult in their mid-20s, with a modern and approachable appearance. showing emotion, dramatic lighting, shallow depth of field, high quality
